actions.name: addComment
actions.description: Add a comment (internal note) to a conversation in Front.

actions.name: addContactHandle
actions.description: Add a handle (email, phone number, etc.) to an existing Contact.

actions.name: addConversationLinks
actions.description: Link external references (URLs) to a conversation.

actions.name: addConversationTags
actions.description: Add one or more tags to a conversation.

actions.name: assignUnassignConversation
actions.description: Assign a conversation to a teammate or remove assignment.

actions.name: createAccount
actions.description: Create a new account in Front.

actions.name: createContact
actions.description: Create a new contact in Front.

actions.name: createDraftReply
actions.description: Create a draft reply to an existing conversation (subject/quote etc.) without sending immediately.

actions.name: createDraft
actions.description: Create a draft message in Front.

actions.name: createLink
actions.description: Create a Link in Front (name, external URL).

actions.name: findAccount
actions.description: List company accounts and optionally filter by email domain or external ID.

actions.name: findContact
actions.description: Look up a contact by handle (email, phone, etc.) or other identifying field.

actions.name: findConversation
actions.description: Find a conversation by search filters such as subject, participants, tags, inbox, etc.

actions.name: removeContactHandle
actions.description: Remove a handle (email, phone number, etc.) from an existing Contact.

actions.name: removeConversationLinks
actions.description: Remove external links from a conversation in Front.

actions.name: removeConversationTags
actions.description: Remove one or more tags from a conversation.

actions.name: sendMessage
actions.description: Send a new message (starts a conversation) with subject, recipients, body, attachments, tags, etc.

actions.name: sendReply
actions.description: Send a reply to a conversation in Front.

actions.name: updateAccount
actions.description: Update an existing account in Front.

actions.name: updateContact
actions.description: Update an existing contact in Front.

actions.name: updateConversation
actions.description: Modify conversation properties: status, assignee, inbox, tags, etc.

actions.name: updateLink
actions.description: Update the name or external URL of a Link in Front.

triggers.name: newComment
triggers.description: Fires when a new comment is posted on a conversation in Front.

triggers.name: newConversationStateChange
triggers.description: Triggers when a conversation changes to a specified state.

triggers.name: newInboundMessage
triggers.description: Fires when a new message is received in a shared inbox.

triggers.name: newOutboundMessage
triggers.description: Fires when a message is sent or replied to in Front.

triggers.name: newTagAddedToMessage
triggers.description: Fires when a tag is applied to a conversation.
